title: FS T206 Blank Back Southern Leaguer.. Price Drop
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: FS T206 Blank Back Southern Leaguer.. Price Drop
posts.post_content:
After seeing the goodwin Auction I've decided to see if anyone wants one of my Southern League  Blank Backs.

Asking $1,500.
The goodwin auction is well over this price and also has a buyers premium...
[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?lotid=19042&searchby=3&searchvalue=t206%20blank&page=0&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1&seo=1909-11-T206-Southern-Leaguer-Dom-Mullaney-(Blank-Back)-SGC-Authentic--%E2%80%9COnly-SGC-Graded-Copy%E2%80%9D#BiddingTag[/url]
The card is guaranteed to holder as a blank back.
